title: Corrosion Of Conformity - Wiseblood
description:
Corrosion Of Conformity
Wiseblood
Metal
1996
192Kbps

1.King of The Rotten
2.Long Whip/Big America
3.Wiseblood
4.Goodbye Windows
5.Born Again For The Last Time
6.Drowning In A Daydream
7.The Snake Has No Head
8.The Door
9.Man Or Ash
10.Redemption City
11.Wishbone [Some Tomorrow]
12.Fuel
13.Bottom Feeder [El Que Come Abajo]

Front, Back And CD Cover Included.


Corrosion of Conformity finally hit on the perfect lineup after a decade of shuffling members and knock out a bone crushing, yet astutely intelligent and passionate album. Wiseblood sounds not unlike its predecessor, Deliverance, with southern rock leanings and crushing Black Sabbathy riffs, but it&#039;s more methodical and deliberate and less adrenaline-hyped overload. The band lets the songs stretch out and breathe, allowing the listener to fully soak in the big rock vibe, without having it furiously hammered home.

Enjoy! :)
